Description: Terracotta figure of Harpocrates holding a bowl, wearing a festival wreath headdress. Mould-made. Red-brown Nile silt fabric.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Excavated or acquired by Hogarth in 1898 (Gutch 1899, 81-96, pl.XII).
Bibliographic references: Gutch 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis, D. The Terracottas (81-96, pl.XII, no.187)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (DD.621) (Phase 3)
